rules_text:
Whenever you cast a aura or equipment spell, copy it.
Aura tokens and equipment tokens you control have “At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter onto attached permanent.”
{G}{W}{U}: Transform Nioh. Activate only as a sorcery.
_
rules_text2:
You have no maximum hand size.
If an aura or equipment card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, return it to your hand instead.
{GU}{WU}: Transform Diviner's Abundance. Activate only as a sorcery.
_
